# rux-menu-item



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property   | Attribute  | Description                                                                                | Type      | Default     |
| ---------- | ---------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ | --------- | ----------- |
| `disabled` | `disabled` | Disables the item                                                                          | `boolean` | `false`     |
| `value`    | `value`    | Value returned when item is selected. If no value is given, the text content will be used. | `any`     | `undefined` |


## Events

| Event         | Description                  | Type                  |
| ------------- | ---------------------------- | --------------------- |
| `itemClicked` | Emitted when item is clicked | `CustomEvent<object>` |


## CSS Custom Properties

| Name                             | Description                             |
| -------------------------------- | --------------------------------------- |
| `--menuItemBackgroundColor`      | Pop Up Menu Item Background Color       |
| `--menuItemHoverBackgroundColor` | Pop Up Menu Item Hover Background Color |
| `--menuItemHoverTextColor`       | Pop Up Menu Item Hover Text Color       |
| `--menuTextColor`                | Pop Up Menu Text Color                  |
